Name: Lux Daiquiri
Ingredients: 60 ml Light gold rum (1-3 year old molasses column)
5 ml Syrup from Luxardo Maraschino Cherries
5 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°Brix)
Instructions: BLEND all ingredients with half a 7oz scoop of crushed ice and serve in chilled glass.
Review: A classic frozen Daiquiri heavily laced with maraschino cherry.
History: Created by yours truly. This was one of the two cocktails with which I won a Havana Club Daiquiri competition in 2002. It is named after Girolamo Luxardo , creator of Luxardo Maraschino liqueur . Lux is also Latin for light.
Nutrition: One serving of Lux Daiquiri contains 199 calories
